name: Breach Game
description:
Creators: Nick S, Liam Shelton, Abby Buck, Ryan Manderville

Made with Unreal Engine 4.26.2

Controls

-WASD to move

-Left Mouse to shoot

Goal

Bad agents have been detected in various locations. Take em out.

Art Credits

Marketplace assets?

- Wood Flooring

- Effects

- Grass Textures

- “Adventure Character” as enemies or player

- will add furniture and environmental assets as we go along; there’s a lot to choose from

-Guns

-edith finch assets
